summary: An ordinance appropriating the sum of Five Thousand Dollars ($5000.00), or so much thereof as may be necessary, to employ expert engineers to assist the Corporation Counsel in the preparation and presentation of the case before the public service commission of the State of Washington to fix the valuation of the properties of the Puget Sound Traction, Light & Power Company, directing the City Comptroller to issue warrants therefor, creating a deficiency and declaring an emergency.
